website_summaries.verdict: The 2-stage lifting system is button-controlled for ease of use, and the 170 pound load capacity is adequate to meet the needs of most users.
pros: The sturdy frame adjusts from 28.5 inches to 47.5 inches, allowing users to customize the height to their individual needs
The laminated desk top resists scratching, and the 60- inch-by-30-inch size is large enough to permit multiple work space setups including almost all common office devices
The simple 2-button controller raises and lowers the desk without requiring tools or manual effort
cons: The single motor only adjust at .5 inches per second, a slower adjustment rate than some other models

customer_reviews.title: Warped desktop
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good value, but.... the table desktop turned out to be a high gloss finish (we wanted matt) and not flat (warped). I requested a return through Amazon (denied). I did get an email response from "Ana" at Apdesk,in which she asked us to contact them at the phone # provided. I've tried three times now and just get a recording. So I have two unassembled desks sitting in boxes.
customer_reviews.author: RSBolt

customer_reviews.title: Well built sturdy design.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice table. I am using two 27" monitors with a 17" dell laptop on a docking station in the center. There is plenty of room and the vertical stroke is impressive. I am 5' 10" and it will go higher than I need it to. When I have it at the standing height, it is slightly shaky, but not anything that I would worry about. If I had it on a hard surface I'm sure it would be quite solid. As a Mechanical Engineer, I would say this is a well designed table. It wasn't difficult to put together, but you will need some space and probably a second person.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very nice standup desk.
customer_reviews.text: I only have positive things to say about this desk. It's solid, attractive and the positioning works great. Installation is straight forward with excellent instructions. I encountered an issue when mounting the controller. The pre-drilled holes were too big for the supplied screws. The screws never bit into the wood at all. I overcame this by whittling some SMALL splinters from some scrap hardwood I had and inserted them into the holes...so all is good. I would rate the 4 1/2 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Dept Head Rawlings

customer_reviews.title: Overall good, but wish it went lower
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of working space; moves up and down fairly quickly. I wish it went lower, though! It goes up uselessly high -- to my chest at the top (I'm 5'6"-- but at its lowest I still need to pump my chair to its highest setting and use a footstool.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Mahmoud

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This desk arrived on time and is fantastic. It was extremely easy to assemble (about 30 minutes by myself). It does wobble a little more then I would like (especially when lowering the desk) but nothing too bad. The only issue I had was the tabletop arrived cracked. I contacted customer service and they had a replacement shipped out the next day. It arrived three days later and all was good. This is an amazing product with solid customer support backing it up.
customer_reviews.author: Matt W.

customer_reviews.title: A perfect but not too expensive sit-stand desk
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Parts fit together extremely well. While the top wobbles a tiny bit when fully up, unless you are tap dancing on the desk, you won' mind it a bit. The width and length are impressive allowing a 32" monitor along with my 27" iMacPro plus external HDS and plenty of space to spread your papers or other gear. It really has met my needs entirely for not much more than a pop up contraption with far less room for about the same price. And it looks pretty good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: She bought it from an engineer who loved his desk
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this 60" Vortex Apex desk for the wife. Her previous purchase was the Apex 71" elite series. She bought it from an engineer who loved his desk. The 71" was too large for the room, so it was sold online (very quickly) and she purchased this new desk. Same color. Love it... it's neutral. You can pick any height you want rather than some of those 3 specific height desks that are available. Really easy up/down feature. It's sturdy and I would definitely recommend. Apex has great customer service. I called with a question and they fixed the simple issue over the phone immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Blum

customer_reviews.title: Desk itself is great, but...
customer_reviews.text: ...it arrived without hardware. Not a nut, bolt, washer or screw. It took quite a bit of time on the phone, asking please send the hardware. The solution was that I should repack the table, and send it back. In the end, since it would not be practical to get the table back into what was left of the backing materials, Amazon offered a discount. I then spend a considerable amount of quality time in the hardware store trying to track down each and every little piece of hardware. In the end, I have a nice table, it works well, but I'd have been far happier if they could have just sent along the missing hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Barton

customer_reviews.title: Decent table for the price
customer_reviews.text: It arrived sooner than expected. Easy to assemble. Seems sturdy, though a little wobbly near max height on my rubber flooring with quite a bit of weight on it. Perhaps it would be more stable on a harder surface, but I'm not planning on using it anywhere else. If I wanted a lot more stability, I would consider attaching a wall anchor, which would prevent me from adjusting the height, but honestly, I don't foresee myself lowering it very often. I don't have any complaints other than the stability, but it's not too bad. Decent table for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Reasoner

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!  Lovvvve It (-:
customer_reviews.text: This product is packaged in two boxes and they arrived on two separate days. That was a puzzle at first, but I was so happy to see that the company did such a good job on labeling and bagging the screws, nuts, and washers which made assembly a breeze. Next and best is that the adjustable table/desk works exactly as described. I had spine surgery and can't sit or stand in the same position for long periods and this makes my work do-able! I am a happy camper!!
customer_reviews.author: mm2323

customer_reviews.title: We now have 5 in the clinic... They're that great!
customer_reviews.text: As a heath care clinic we wanted to have the ability of sit and stand work stations for our employees that stay in one place for most of the day. We found these desks and initially bought 2, then 2 more, and now this 1 = 5 total in the office. We have had -0- troubles. They work great and there is plenty of work space for busy days at work. We have shown them to many clients who are looking for ergonomic suggestions for pain relief, and easy recommendation to make. We definitely like these desks / work stations.
customer_reviews.author: CANDICE for Axis PT

customer_reviews.title: Great for the home office
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the standing feature so I could change position while at my desk for multiple hours of the day. The raising/lowering is a little slow, but that's fine. The wood top is rather heavy, leading me to believe that it's a solid piece of real wood; not the particle-board desks that are seen at other places. It's a well made desk, using sturdy metal and wood. Had it for several months now and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Holman

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect table for homeoffice.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this table! If you are working from home, you need such table. 1. High quality build 2. Reasonable Price 3. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: KevinHe

customer_reviews.title: Good adjustable desk.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She loves it. The Cherry top looks nice. The electric lift functions well. This was about 1/3 the price of other similar adjustable desks. I'd get this one again, and save the money. I wil note that the up/down buttons require you to hold them to keep it moving up or down. Vortex has a control unit with pre-sets, but this unit does not have the pre-set height stops.
customer_reviews.author: Bolt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk. Large surface area
customer_reviews.text: Excellent desk. Large surface area, highly adjustable. I have not used it in standing mode as I have 2 large monitors on it. Even without the standing mode, the height adjustment is useful to calibrate your workspace to be more ergonomic. Included a free upgrade so the desk as 4 "memory" settings, where it will move to that height setting when you press the button. Not too useful, but a nice bonus. Well built, spacious, definitely earns 5 stars. By the way, make sure you get the wire organizer if you plan to have a lot of electronics on the desk, otherwise it will look very cluttered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions and get the cable tray too.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk. Works great in the tallest position. I am 6'2 and works great. If you get the cable tray make sure you put that on before the table top. I am enjoying it and being able to stand while I work is great.
customer_reviews.author: mrmcc916

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this desk!! It’s so big and I have a treadmill underneath plus a chair. Love love it
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and well built. I do recommend the table be built from the legs up instead of the board to the feet then reversing when complete to avoid the damage to the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Sturdy, Quality
customer_reviews.text: A sedentary lifestyle is a huge risk for cardiovascular disease and other conditions. I wanted a desk I can also use while standing. This is slightly pricey, but it is a quality, durable desk. The pieces are extremely heavy and may require two people to actually lift.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycen

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy. Wide enough. Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have some back problems and decided to invest an electric stand desk to use at home. This stand desk is very pretty, wide enough to hold laptops, notebooks, screens. Definitely recommend! =)
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this desk! I had been wanting a standing desk, but didn't want to commit to one full time- this fit the bill perfectly. It was delivered on time and the packaging was really well done. I was able to put it together by myself in about an hour and a half. My controller was glitchy after a week, but ApexDesk customer service was top notch and sent out a replacement one right away. Everyone at the office loves it and in fact, we've already ordered a second one. I have a feeling these desks are going to become a staple item where I work.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and sturdiness!
customer_reviews.text: This desk was so easy to assemble and is most amazing to use! It moves up and down steadily without any jerking allowing me to leave even my cup of coffee on the desk while it moves without worry. I would certainly buy this desk again!
customer_reviews.author: U

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I've ever given anything 5 stars but this desk was perfect. It came boxed correctly and undamaged. It was easy to put together and performs better than I expected. I've had it for over 2 months now and no issues at all. It's refreshing to get a product that beats expectations. The price was reasonable as well. My only wish was that they had one that was about 25% smaller, for a smaller office.
customer_reviews.author: R F

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this desk
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this desk! Pros: Price packaging ease of setup Con: gets a little wobbly at max height but i have 3 27'' monitors and a laptop uhhhhh doesn't read minds... Great desk great folks that sell them 9/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason.Robin

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is very sturdy I hooked up a desk mount stand and is ...
customer_reviews.text: One part was missing the controller, emailed the support and they shipped in a new one ASAP. Took care of it via one email. The product itself is very sturdy I hooked up a desk mount stand and is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: VamC

customer_reviews.title: This desk is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the desk about two months now and nothing but great things to say. I am a tax person so am at by desk about 12 hours a day...especially this time of year...so having the ability to stand while I am on calls or just while doing some work is such a help. My boyfriend built it for me but he said the parts were all individually marked and while it took two hours was not bad. I have not noticed any of the wobbling others noted but I do have it on carpet. Just wanted to share my thoughts as I know the desk is pricier then some other models...but totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ring

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk is working great for our home office. Due to back problems I prefer to stand. Adjustability is good. It would be good if the maker had a stand for a monitor.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this desk and the price is fantastic. The motor works well
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. The quality of this desk and the price is fantastic. The motor works well. A very tall person can you this desk as it goes pretty high. I love love this desk. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Acquaviva Wellness

customer_reviews.title: ApexDesk Vortex Series 60" desk
customer_reviews.text: Excellent adjustable desk that afkusts to where you want it. My office staff love them. Bought thesea couple of years ago and needed another one. Good price for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Olympia Amazon Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Desk, but.......
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be mounted on a wood floor, or it becomes unstable when extended to its highest level when mounted on a rug.
customer_reviews.author: Falcon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for tall telecommuters
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this desk for two weeks. Thus far the motor works well. This is a big plus for me as I am 6 feet tall and have adjusted the height of the desk to my comfort level. Nice and spacious surface area for those of us who work from home.
customer_reviews.author: Lady of the House

customer_reviews.title: Changed the way I work from home!
customer_reviews.text: Really has changed the way I feel working from home. No longer stuck in same seated position for 8-10 hours a day. Easy to assemble and the power positioning hasn't had any hiccups in over 3 months of use. Looking forward to continued use!
customer_reviews.author: ACL

customer_reviews.title: Stand Up desk a winner
customer_reviews.text: Desk arrived today and was assembled in about 30 minutes (2 people). Assembly instructions easy to understand and kudos for including extra hardware. Works flawlessly. New owner of desk is a happy to be standing up!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Peterson

customer_reviews.title: The desk is great, went together easily
customer_reviews.text: Originally the desk arrived missing the nuts and bolts. Contacted the company and they sent them out same day. The desk is great, went together easily, works well and great support. What more can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: gconley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DESK!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT desk. It's very heavy and well made. I have noticed most adjustable desk have a cross brace that spans between the legs, limiting leg room underneath. This desk does not but is still very stable in both the sitting and standing positions. If you're looking for a simple yet attractive adjustable computer desk I'd highly recommend this one. ApexDesk was well packaged, was delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Lapper

customer_reviews.title: but was so pleased with ApexDesk's customer service
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but was so pleased with ApexDesk's customer service. The desk top was damaged when it arrived and Apex bent over backwards to get me a replacement top in the shortest amount of time. They were so pleasant and helpful to deal with. And I am pleased with their product.
customer_reviews.author: Blycc

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this almost 3 years ago and I love it. Desk is sturdy and there's basically no wobbling even when it's raised. I raise and lower it all the time, and after 3 years, one of the gears that raises the desk broke. I reached out to support and they are sending replacement gears (both of them!) free of charge, even though my desk is outside of the warranty. Really happy with the desk and customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Goran Peretin

customer_reviews.title: Flipped it and remove the "this side goes against the desk" sticker and it was fine. Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: This desk is fabulous. Much sturdier than the motorized desks I looked at at IKEA for the same price. It was close to 3 hrs to put together and we only had one head scratching moment when we attached the up/down box the way the sticker said and then the up button functioned as the down. Flipped it and remove the "this side goes against the desk" sticker and it was fine. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable desk.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Easy to put together if you are somewhat handy. I did it by myself and it is a bit heavy, but definately doable.
customer_reviews.author: bookish

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product and it's also very nice looking. Assembly was easy. It can be done by one person but two makes it easier. Instructions are clear and easy to follow. They even give a small bag of spare parts (washers, etc). The product arrives in two packages, one for the top and one for the leg assembly. Both were packaged well and there was no damage from shipping. I am very pleased with my purchase and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great desk but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: the desk looks nice, is stable, inexpensive and easy to assemble. Cons: desktop is really heavy and big and hard to carry up stairs; and the motor is loud. The desk is more appropriate for a large office on the first floor.
customer_reviews.author: Sera Park

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very heavy duty and stable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, very heavy duty and stable. Very happy with this. The only cheap item is the button for raising and lowering. The instructions are easy to follow. Took me less than 30min to build in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but arrived damaged, had to return it but got new one OK
customer_reviews.text: Nice but arrived damaged, had to return it but got new one OK
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but it needs to be lower
customer_reviews.text: On the lowest setting of the desk it is still a little high for me when I sit. This caused severe health problem to my neck and spine. If they can have the lowest at 25 inches that would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price this desk is amazing. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: For the price this desk is amazing. Sturdy, super easy to assemble (did it myself with some careful planning), all tools included. So far the motor is working reliably after a couple weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jing

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This desk is great. It comfortably fits 2 monitors, a laptop, keyboard and phone, with room for papers. I move it up and down a couple times a day without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brandonc123

customer_reviews.title: and I am so pleased with how it works
customer_reviews.text: My desk arrived in flawless condition, and I am so pleased with how it works. I can finally give my hips some relief during the work day!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk
customer_reviews.text: Excellent desk. Mine came with a free upgrade for the controller. It has 4 memory buttons in addition to the up and down buttons. Not sure if they are giving everyone free upgrade now or if it's random. Anyway the desk is great. Plenty of room and the height adjustment works really smoothly. Assembly instructions were clear and it took me about 45 minutes to put it together by myself
customer_reviews.author: Ludefolife

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the material is very good and sturdy and the dimension is pretty good to ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material is very good and sturdy and the dimension is pretty good to hold my two monitors and laptop. Doing more work from home after this desk. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mugunthan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Smooth motor operation to raise/lower the desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk is very well-designed and high-quality. Very sturdy. Smooth motor operation to raise/lower the desk. Some competitor desks have sharp corners, this has large radiused corners. No complaints whatever. Would be again in a heartbeat. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T.

customer_reviews.title: Most Affluent of Tables
customer_reviews.text: This was everything I wanted and more. The price was extremely affordable compared to other similar products on the market. Furthermore assembly was IKEA level easy. I was shocked. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: A scientist of exceptional note

customer_reviews.title: Simple Desk
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple standing desk and was very pleased once i had setup this desk. I was happy to see that the company did such a good job on labeling and bagging the screws, nuts, and washers which made assembly a breeze. The lift is steady without any wobble. I have mounted my monitors and have had no issues. Its a great simple look that functions great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great desk. Lifting mechanism works well
customer_reviews.text: Great desk. Lifting mechanism works well. If you want an under desk keyboard drawer - The Human Solution uplift keyboard tray with 11 inch track will work - most others will not due to support beam in center of desk. Very happy with the quality and look of the desk.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: had it for ~3 months and it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this sit stand desk. Very useful since I work from home a lot. And even after 3 years it still feels new.
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh N.

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues on drilled holes requiring extra installation help, otherwise a great desk
customer_reviews.text: I like the desk now that it's set up, but my partner had to file down the holes on the top where it meets the legs during installation to get them to line up. Very poor quality control despite the fact that it looks like they used a machine to line up the top piece to punch the holes. I also bump the up/down buttons quite a bit if I'm standing at the desk next to someone. But hey, I'm the one that wanted an electronic desk. :) Otherwise it works great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars just for assembly manual! It is easy to follow, I have actually enjoyed the process. Oh, also the desk is amazing, I never had a standing desk, so it is a huge upgrade for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Dmytro Zharii

customer_reviews.title: I had been looking for a sturdy reasonably priced adjustable standing desk forever
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a sturdy reasonably priced adjustable standing desk forever. This desk fit the bill perfectly. Very happy with it so far. Have been using it for a few months without issues.
customer_reviews.author: ineedlotsofhelp

customer_reviews.title: A great desk / great value
customer_reviews.text: I have a home office and found myself sitting for up to 12 hours / day. The desk is easy to assemble, VERY sturdy and the electric motors work very well. I shopped for this and found similar desks for much more $'s.
customer_reviews.author: Chip R.

customer_reviews.title: Hectic Product Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Assembly of this product is the worst. They would have made it much simpler but nope.
customer_reviews.author: Rehan B

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk!
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to put together. Love this desk at my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Desk!
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was great with this company! I love my new Desk and although today is my first day using it, I am extremely happy with it. My husband says it was not bad to put together.....it took him about 4 hours but that was while watching a few movies too.
customer_reviews.author: Mali McKennie

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: ANYONE who works at a desk a lot should have one of these!
customer_reviews.author: WayMeister

customer_reviews.title: love this desk
customer_reviews.text: Wish I bought it earlier, never feel lower back pain when working at home since I bought it. Fair price and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: ying zhang

customer_reviews.title: Missing the top of the desk
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the desk - but the top did not come.... only the bottom support section came. Super disappointed, returning and likely will not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: helloyello

customer_reviews.title: This is a awesome table. It's very simple to set up overall
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome table. It's very simple to set up overall, and great to use. Love it. Hint: When you're mounting it the top, make sure to take out the power cable.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble I like how you can set the height and then unplug the cord and store.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa L Owens

customer_reviews.title: Its so easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Its so easy to build. They even label the bolts/nuts/washers for you, so you dont have to look for the right ones. Amazing desk!!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Vera

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price, easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This desk is exactly what I needed. Perfect size, easy to assemble, great construction. Arrived quickly, packaged very well too. I spend about 80% of my day standing now, vs sitting. Height motor is pretty quiet and quickly adjusts desk to desired height.
customer_reviews.author: Surfbob

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk
customer_reviews.text: Great Desk! Very easy to put together as well. Emailed the vendor with a question and their customer service is on target. If you are looking for a sit/stand desk I couldn't recommend it more.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Graham

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. Love being able to stand and work ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Love being able to stand and work at home!! The legs after assembled are a little askew but it works. I wish they had it in white. I was going for a more modern office.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie McCaughey

customer_reviews.title: This desk is nice, i like it
customer_reviews.text: This desk is nice, i like it. The motor just make a lot of noise that's all, for $500 it's not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tech1Tv

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Easy to assemble. Good for my body. Easy to operate. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Eller

customer_reviews.title: Pricey Desk with damaged components
customer_reviews.text: When the desk arrived several of the metal components were dented and scratched when pulled brand new from the box. Assembly instructions were simple and reasonably easy to follow. For the expense, damaged parts should not have been delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought - needed a lot of room to put it together. Great Desk!! Sturdy and does exactly as it describes. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new desk - and ApexDesk has great customer service
customer_reviews.author: amelon

customer_reviews.title: One minor gripe is that the plastic coverings to the cable management holes are cheap and easily breaks if you apply pressure to the top
customer_reviews.text: An electrically height-adjustable desk is one of those luxuries that you really should spring for first if you're going to get any at all. Your future self's back, neck and shoulders will thank you. One minor gripe is that the plastic coverings to the cable management holes are cheap and easily breaks if you apply pressure to the top. Paradoxically, opening them they way they're supposed to is stiff and takes a lot of force. I don't use them anyway. The opening is too small to fit more than a few wires. Be mindful of cable length when cable managing your desk space. I recommend bringing it to your standing height when cable managing to give yourself the necessary leeway.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Easy to assemble. They may have changed their packaging. My desktop was VERY well protected and sustained no damage in shipment. I love the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Bill

customer_reviews.title: Ugly Fake Wood Grain Top
customer_reviews.text: The top is a fake wood grain and does not look good.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Bourquin

customer_reviews.title: It is important to follow the easy assembly instructions exactly.
customer_reviews.text: This desk is perfect for standing or sitting while you work. It is very easy to assemble (which I did all by myself!) and to use. While I like to stand and work most of the time, this desk is the perfect option to easily lower for sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy F.

customer_reviews.title: strong build and good quality of the frame and top
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this desk for 3 days now, strong build and good quality of the frame and top. The electric controller works great and not found any comparable desk to this so far online. And finally, the customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Shaan

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy

customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and very well made - especially for the price. Packaged well and instructions are clear. Suggest taking the suggestion of assembling the legs upside down and then finishing upright included in the instructions. All hardware (even extra hardware included) was top notch and easy to use.

product_meta.title: ApexDesk Vortex Series 60" 2-Button Electric Height Adjustable Sit to Stand Desk, Espresso Top with Standard Controller
product_meta.description: Color:Espresso Top With Standard ControllerWhen we set out to design our 2nd generation electric standing desk - the Vortex Series, we have two main things on our mind. stability - our 1St Generation Apex Series desk has won wide acclaim as one of the most stable desks in the market. We want to take a step further and make it more stable. All standing desk in the market wobbles somewhat at standing Height. Crossbar is often used to stabilize the desk. But it takes away some leg room and the flexibility of adding an exercise bike/treadmill by some users. We want ours to be free of crossbar. After many experiments, we have come up with an unique solution by adding a bearing that synchronizes with desk movement to improve stability between sections. We have also added anti-collision function -- The desk stops automatically if its movement is obstructed. look - Standing desks are long on functionality but short on aesthetics. They all look alike - a top over two lifting columns. We are yet to break away From that norm. But we have made ours stand out from the crowd by using brushed aluminum rather than steel, and using black/silver colors rather than one solid color for our underframe. The rounded corners of the top go perfectly with the round lifting columns of the underframe. The end result is quite remarkable - a 30% lighter and 30% more stable desk that looks amazing.
feature_bullets: Superior stability & sturdy industrial-grade aluminum underframe.
This product meets the minimum requirements of ANSI/BIFMA standards.
1" thick 59x29. 5" top with scratch-resistant high-pressure laminate
